En la actualidad, con mucho esfuerzo, formó una bodega, que gracias a los préstamos que está recibiendo de Manuela Ramos la está implementando con más productos de primera necesidad.

Con el préstamo de S/ 3,000 soles, el cual pagará en 5 meses implementará su bodega con la compra de 2 sacos de arroz, 1 saco de azúcar, 2 cajas de leches, 2 cajas de refrescos, 1 caja de aceite, etc.

Al principio Liz tuvo muchas dudas para dedicarse a la venta de abarrotes, pero se dio cuenta, con el tiempo y con el apoyo de Manuela Ramos, que el negocio le estaba dando buenos resultados. Junto con su esposo, que la apoya, quiere seguir creciendo como mujer y como empresaria.

loans.use: Purchase of groceries (sugar, rice, milk, cooking oil, etc)

loans.name: Hilvat

texts.ru:
Hilvat Valievna A. lives in Yavan, Tajikistan. She is 43, married with 4 children. She has a medical education and works as a nurse in the local ambulatory clinic. Her husband is unemployed. Hilvat’s salary is so low that it’s not enough even to buy milk for the children. Hilvat wants to buy a cow to provide milk for her family and to sell the excess, if any, to her neighbors, who have no cows either. She plans to do this at a price lower than the local market price. It would really help her family as well as her neighbors. She needs a loan to make her dream come true. She plans to repay the loan in 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Sheyner, Kiva Volunteer

Азимова Хилват Валиевна проживает в городе Яван. Замужем , имеет 4 детей. Ей 43 года. Образование Средне-специальное. По профессии медсестра. Муж нигде не работает. Сама она работает в местной поликлинике , медсестрой. Зарплата очень маленькая , ей не хватает даже на молоко детям, поэтому клиентка хочет купить корову , которая будет давать молоко для ее семьи , а если будет лишнее сможет продавать соседям , таким же как она у которых нет коровы по доступной цене , ниже рыночной. Это будет помощью как для ее семьи , так и для ее соседей. Но для этого она должна получить кредит , который поможет выполнить ее планы. А погасить кредит клиентка сможет в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy a cow

loans.name: Pov

texts.en:
Pov E. is a married mother of six living in a village about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh, Cambodia's capital city. She and her husband, a mason, have been married for 21 years. Five of their children are in school, while their oldest son is a construction worker.

For the past three years, Pov has made a living by selling firewood. She buys it from a local province and resells it in their village. She is requesting a loan of $1,000 U.S. dollars to buy a saw for cutting the firewood and also to purchase more wood to sell.

loans.use: To buy a saw and wood for a firewood business

loans.name: Mawo

texts.fr:
Mawo sells telephone accessories and other electronics products. He has set himself up in the central market of Mbour. With this loan, he is counting on being able to expand his business to meet the high demand for his goods.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva volunteer

MAWO s' active dans la vente des produits éléctroniques accessoires de téléphone ,et autres matériels éléctroniques.il est établi au marché central de MBOUR. Avec ce pret il compte renforcer ses activités pour povoir faire face à la forte demende

loans.use:
business capital

Fonds de commerce

loans.name: Rorng

texts.en: Rorng S., 33, lives in Siem Reap Province with her husband and their four children. Her husband operates a business pumping sand, making $3 each day, while their four children are students at the local school. Rorng S. has seen an opportunity to expand her husband’s business and increase the family’s income, and therefore has asked CREDIT for a loan of $1000 to purchase a piece of land that will allow them to pump more sand. She believes that their standard of living can be improved and that she can better care for her family through this loan and purchase.

loans.use: To purchase land.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David is a young father with responsibility of taking care of his wife and two children, who are the driving force for his work. Everyday, early in the morning, David leaves to take care of his farmland, which he irrigates and fertilizes so his crops produce, and then when the harvest he can have quality products in order to get better income. His wife appears in the photo above, showing part of his production, in this case, of potato. One of this couple’s dreams is to use part of their earnings to buy the house where they live, which as of the moment they rent, but they still can’t complete this dream as they lack financial resources to do so. They are asking for the current loan to increase their crop production by buying seed, fertilizer and other supplies necessary for farming their land.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

David a temprana edad formó su familia, tiene la responsabilidad de cuidar de su esposa y dos hijos, quienes son el motor para su trabajo. Por ello, cada día, de madrugada, David sale rumbo a sus terrenos de cultivo, los cuales riega y abona para su adecuada producción, y así en la cosecha puede tener productos de calidad para obtener mejores ingresos económicos. Quien aparece en la foto es su esposa, mostrando parte de su producción, en este caso, papa. Uno de los sueños de esta pareja es que parte de sus ganancias puedan usarla en al compra de la casa donde viven, que actualmente alquilan, pero aún ese sueño no se puede hacer realidad por falta de recursos. Ellos solicitan el presente préstamo para incrementar su producción, con la compra de semilla, abonos y demás insumos necesarios para sus tierras.

loans.use: Buy seed, fertilizer and other supplies necessary for farming

loans.name: Salama's Tusonge Mbele Group

texts.en:
Salama is a 47-year-old widow with three adult children aged 25, 23 and 21. She has been a porridge seller for the past 14 years and earns a monthly profit of about $40 from her sales.

Salama hopes for a loan to increase her stock. She will share this loan with her sub-group members, Husna and Maryam, who sell soap and clothing.

loans.use: To increase her stock.

loans.name: Denis Julian

texts.es: Don Denis H., es un hombre que tiene 43 años de edad, es casado le tiene tres hijos con edades comprendidas entre los doce, diez, y ocho años respectivamente cursando la primaria todos , su esposa se desempeña como cajera  en una tienda comercial, el proposito del señor es poder ampliar sus condiciones de vida y economicas, darse a conocer ante el mercado como joyero, y no solamente darse a conocer a nivel nacional sino a nivel internacional como han llegado a darse a conocer otras joyerias de nicaragua producto del buen servicio y calidad del trabajo que ofertan, su mayor sueño es poder darle a sus hijos una enseñanza a fin de que se puedan desarrollar como profesionales, tambien tiene el deseo de instalar un local propio ya que actualmente alquila y trabajar con equipos modernos y generar empleos, el señor H., da inicio en esta actividad como apreniz y con el tiempo poco a poco a llegado a independizarse e instalar su propia joyeria.
texts.en:
Mr. Denis H. is a 43 year old man, married, with three children ages 12, 10 and 8 years old, all of whom are in primary school. His wife works as a cashier in a local store. Mr. H.'s intention is to improve his income and standard of living, become known as a jeweler, not only nationally but internationally, as other Nicaraguan jewelry stores have become known for their good service and quality work that they offer. His greatest dream is to be able to provide his children an education so that they may become professionals, also he has the wish to open his own locale as today he rents and to work with modern equipment and generate jobs. Mr, H. begins this business as an apprentice and with time little by little will become independent and open his own jewelry store.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital for his business

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr: Madame Khady T. est une commerçante expérimentée dans son domaine. Elle a toujours fait du commerce produits alimentaires depuis plus de dix ans. Elle est mére de famille et grâce à ses activités, elle entretiens sa famille et s'occupe bien d'elle. elle fait des chiffres d'affaires de dix à quinze milles francs cfa par jours. Ce crédit accordé va lui permettre de renforcer ses activités et augmanter ainsi ses bénéfices pour le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Khady T. is a merchant with a good deal of experience. She has sold foodstuffs for more than 10 years. She is the mother of a family and thanks to her earnings, she supports her family and takes good care of them. She has a turnover of about 10-15,000 CFA per day. The loan that she is requesting will allow her to bolster her business and increase her earnings for the well-being of her family.

Translated from French by Teresa Kramer, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: sale of foodstuffs

loans.name: Chantha

texts.en:
Mrs. Chantha P. is a villager in Prey Meilang Cheoung village in Takeo Province. She is a farmer who owns a small piece of land to cultivate rice to earn a living. In her plantation, she faces some problems because her field is infertile and has a lot of pests which affect her crop. In addition, she does not have enough money to deal with her problems.

In order to solve these problems, she decided to request for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides to support her field to make her crop more productive, and hire laborers to plant seedlings and to harvest rice. Her husband, Mr. Sem Mao, is a fisherman. Mrs. Chantha P. is 40 years old and the mother of five children who are attending the local school. Her husband is also in the photo.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides and hire laborers to plant seedlings and harvest the rice

loans.name: Maksud

texts.en: S. Maksud is a young and energetic guy. From when he was only 16 he started his own business in order to support his parents. His business is selling housewares in one of the local markets of the city. This business allows him not only to support his family but also his own education as Maksud is studying at university. Today Maksud needs to increase the range of his goods and is asking a loan of 1000 Somoni (300 USD) for the term of 12 months. This loan will allow him to expand his business, to earn more and to realize more of his future projects. Be an important part of the growth of Maksud’s business.

loans.use: Housewares to expand his business.

loans.name: Siddiqa Ghulam Haider Group

texts.en:
Siddiqa baji is a 43-years-old married lady and resides in a city called Borewala, Pakistan. She is the mother of three children: one son and two daughters. Her son works in a factory. Her elder daughter is in 8th standard and her younger daughter is in 5th standard. Siddiqa baji’s husband's name is G. H. and he drives an auto-rickshaw (a local three-wheeled motor vehicle). Siddiqa baji has a sewing business. She sews clothes for her neighbors and earns income. She successfully repaid her first loan from Asasah (a micro-finance institution in Pakistan). Now she is applying for a loan to change the body of the auto-rickshaw of her husband.

Siddiqa baji is the group leader for some more women from her locality. Zareena baji and Jamila baji and another Jamila baji each want a loan to buy an auto-rickshaw. Kalsoom baji wants a loan to buy vehicle wheels to re-sell.

This is a group loan. The loan funds will be distributed among the group members, each of whom will invest in her own business. The members mutually guarantee one another's loans. If one member does not repay, the other members are responsible.

loans.use: To change the body of their auto-rickshaw (a local three-wheeled motor vehicle)
